reviewText: some bitter memories for an english person but GREAT all around i very much agree with the goals on this tape!

Of Course, when you see a video claiming to have the 101 greatest goals of all time, you expect to see the greatest goals. This video includes all of the most famous goals, including Maradona's(greatest player of all time)2-1 goal to put Argentina into the semi-finals.
This video is great. It captures fantastic moments in the Premiership. I never get tired of watching it when I need a quick GOAL fix. Enjoy!
